Package com.array64.socialCredit.api

Interface SocialCreditListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BanListener, KeepInventoryListener, LifestealListener, UHCListener
public interface SocialCreditListener
An interface for social credit event listeners meant to be implemented. These are meant to be registered with SocialCreditSystem.addListener(SocialCreditListener).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onSocialCreditChange(SocialCreditChangeEvent e)
    This is called whenever the social credit score of a player is changed.
    void
    onSocialCreditLoad(SocialCreditLoadEvent e)
    This is called whenever the social credit score of a player is loaded (when the plugin is enabled or the player joins).
